array.string: Use `components(separatedBy: " ")` to split a string into an array of words.

dict.string: `let words = secret.components(separatedBy: " ")`\ `for word in words {`\ ` scene.write(word.reversed())`\ `}`

### Super!
Chopping up strings can be quite useful if, for example, you want to do something with each word in a string—like write it backward or jumble up the letters.
